Jojo's group acquired a car while in the sacred city of Varanasi,
and are now heading toward Pakistan.
Soon we will reach the Indo-Pakistani border...
We will be saying goodbye to India very soon.
At first I wondered what kind of country we would walked into,
but now I miss the hustle and bustle of Calcutta,
and the rushing waters of the Ganges.
I will be coming back again,
so I can make Avdol a proper grave.
I am going to pass them.
Hey, do you think that might have flung pebbles at their car?
We do not need any trouble or accidents right now.
I am wanted because of what happened in Varanasi, you know.
I would like to get across the border safely.
I just told you we do not need accidents!
Look who is standing over there!
I mean, I am a girl.
Soon I will be wearing a bra, and doing my nails for the boys.
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
I would look pathetic wandering around the world when I am that age.
This is the only chance I have!
To run away from home and see the world...
I mean, I feel bad for lying about going to see my dad in Singapore,
but let us just forget that.
It is the car we passed earlier.
They appear to be in a hurry.
What are they trying to do?
I let you pass, so hurry up and go.
Maybe they are mad because you were so reckless earlier.
Did you see the driver's face?
Maybe it is because of all the dust on the window,
but I could not see them.
Now he is telling me to pass!
Looks like he remembered how shitty his car is.
You should have just stayed behind me in the first place, dumbass.
If it were not for Star Platinum's power, we would have been crushed.
Do you think that car's driver might be one of the Stand users that are after us?
Or do you think it is just some random asshole?
Of course it is someone who is after us!
But there has not been anything like a Stand attack yet.
Anyway, all we can do is be careful as we head for the border.
If someone comes after us again,
we will just take them down, no matter who they are.
What should we do about that truck?
Star Platinum punched it, so it is pretty messed up.
Just pretend you never saw it.
I am going to go crazy...
If we take our time, we may avoid running into that car.
Hey, I need to ask you something.
Where is the driver of that car parked over there?
I did not notice when it parked there...
I doubt that the driver will just come out and announce himself.
This leaves us with only one option.
It will involve some innocent bystanders, but...
We will just beat them all down!
A face like yours looks the most suspicious...
What is he trying to do?
He seems like a random crazy driver,
but also like someone who is after us.
It is going to piss me off
if we do not chase him down and take care of this.
we owe him payback for the truck that almost hit us earlier!
For a piece of shit car, it goes pretty fast.
we should be running parallel with train tracks here.
We are going to catch him in a second.
I am going to nail him on that curve!
And a car could not cross that suspension bridge...
How did he get behind us?
H-He is pushing us with immense horsepower...
Everyone, abandon the car and get out!
What kind of driver gets out of the car before everyone else?!
Who is going to hold down the brake pedal?
Hierophant is not strong enough to hold this much weight!
It will just tear its body apart!
I beg your pardon, Mr. Joestar,
but I know myself quite well.
It flew up holding the car's wire winch!
By the way, do you like sumo?
Especially deadlocks at the edge of the ring...
It is exciting, is not it?
But Jotaro, in sumo, it is against the rules to punch your opponent.
Since I did not see anything that looked like a Stand attack,
I guess it was just some weirdo.
Either way, he cannot possibly survive.
Well, I guess he got what he deserved.
That car was suddenly behind us.
It is not strange at all...
It is coming from the car radio!
It was able to do that because it is a Stand, Joestar!
If it knows my name, it must be one
of the Stand users that are after us!
Could it be from the car that just fell?
No, there is a possibility the whole car is a Stand.
Just like the Stand for Strength was a boat.
That is the card my Stand suggests.
Everyone get away from the car!
It burrowed up through the ground!
I think it is pretty obvious that car is actually a Stand!
It appears that the Stand's user is inside.
It is like a living creature!
It wants to see who is stronger.
Not until we know what that Stand's power is!
What did it shoot at me, and how?
When you are about to die, that is!
The wounds are not deep, but it is digging in!
I cannot see it at all.
The Stand appeared to be throwing something at us, but there is nothing
I do not know what kind of attack it is,
but it is got good control.
I will go after your legs so you cannot run anymore,
What the hell are you guys?
It is forcing its way in!
We are no match for it.
It is acting like some stupid musclehead who could not figure out a puzzle ring,
so he just pitched a violent fit instead!
Yeah, I ran away from home.
I am all alone and no one loves me!
If you have time to say all that, you can run, you little brat.
There are literally no roads left for you!
Not for escape, not for survival, not for Egypt,
not even a road toward your shining future!
Wheel of Fortune is going to grind you into hamburger
and splatter you all over these boulders!
Is there anything this car cannot do?!
Looks like we are going to have to face it.
Once it climbs up here, we will see the car's underside.
That is when we will find out who is stronger.
Once the car's underside is in view,
we may be able to attack it.
and you have not even noticed!
Come to think of it, I smell gasoline.
It was shooting gasoline at us!
It was shooting small amounts of gasoline at high speed, like bullets.
So his attacks were not to wound us,
but to soak our bodies with gasoline?!
Looks like you finally caught on, but it is too late now!
Do not go near him, Mr. Joestar!
There is gasoline on our bodies, as well.
And who exactly is going to replace me, Jotaro Kujo?
You did not think it would be you, did you?
You burrowed into the ground with Star Platinum!
So the only thing that burned up was your jacket!
By the way, were not you saying something about roads earlier?
A road is something that you make yourself.
And so, I, Jotaro Kujo, will show you how it is done.
I will show you exactly how roads are built!
That is how it is done.
Where you went flying, there is now literally a road.
His arms were so huge, and yet everything else is so small.
I am just in this for the money!
To think that the Stand was disguising such a small car, too.
It looks like a sheep that is just been shorn.
I am a priest in training.
Please do not disturb my ascetic exercises by undoing my restraints.
Let us take this car across the border,
I wonder if it will last that long.
By the way, you are going back to Hong Kong on an airplane.
Do not you get that you are in the way?
All of the seven Stand users I sent have been defeated.
All of them have been crushed!
I cannot bear to face Lord Dio.
As well as Jotaro and that geezer Joestar!
I, Enyaba, will now face you personally!
With my own Stand, the Justice card!
The fog is getting worse from over there.
They died with that look of fear on their face!
What is with everyone in this town?
This is not an ordinary murder.
